00011 // FuncIdentity struct definition
00012 // x -> x
00014 
00015 struct FuncIdentity {
00016     inline static const double & func(const double & x) {
00017         return x;
00018     }
00019 };

00021 
00022 
00024 // FuncLinearThreshold struct definition
00025 // x -> max(THRESHOLD_MIN, min(x, THRESHOLD_MAX))
00027 
00028 struct FuncLinearThreshold {
00029     inline static const double & func(const double & x) {
00030         return (x < THRESHOLD_MIN) ? THRESHOLD_MIN : ((x > THRESHOLD_MAX) ? THRESHOLD_MAX : x);
00031     }
00032     static const double THRESHOLD_MIN;
00033     static const double THRESHOLD_MAX;
00034 };
00035 
00036 
00037 
00039 // FuncSigmoid struct definition
00040 // x -> 1 - exp(-x)
00041 // SATURATED_RATE is the max rate
00043 
00044 #define SATURATED_RATE 30
00045 
00046 struct FuncSigmoid {
00047     inline static double func(const double & x) {
00048         return (x < 0) ? 0 : SATURATED_RATE - SATURATED_RATE * exp(-x / SATURATED_RATE);
00049     }
00050 };
00051 
00052 #undef SATURATED_RATE
00053 
00054 
00055 
00057 // FuncSigmoidSquare struct definition
00058 // x -> 1 - exp(-x^2)
00059 // SATURATED_RATE is the max rate, SATURATED_RATE_SQUARE_DOUBLE must be the double of the square of SATURATED_RATE
00061 
00062 #define SATURATED_RATE 30
00063 #define SATURATED_RATE_SQUARE_DOUBLE 1800
00064 
00065 struct FuncSigmoidSquare {
00066     inline static double func(const double & x) {
00067         return (x < 0) ? 0 : SATURATED_RATE - SATURATED_RATE * exp(-x * x / SATURATED_RATE_SQUARE_DOUBLE);
00068     }
00069 };
00070 
00071 #undef SATURATED_RATE
00072 #undef SATURATED_RATE_SQUARE_DOUBLE
00073 
00074 
00075 
00076 #endif // !defined(NEURONACTIVATIONFUNCTION_H)
